title: T204's for sale List Updated more cards added 5-25-2014
author: sb1

posts.post_title: T204's for sale List Updated more cards added 5-25-2014
posts.post_content:
Have a few T204 Ramly's for sale.


Jimmy Collins SCG 50 $1,000
Roy Hartzell SGC 70(a bit of green toning from the gold, but super sharp)$450
John Hummell SGC 20, appears much nicer, some surface scrapes $175(tough card)
Bill O'Hare SGC 40 Lionel Carter SOLD
Jack Powell SGC 50 SOLD
Rube Manning SGC 70, identical to the Hartzell above, SOLD
Hobe Ferris SGC 50, nice for the grade $275
Art Devlin SGC 40 $225
George Bell SGC AUT This card is not trimmed in my opinion, if it does not sell I am going to resubmit it. Pretty sharp but it has a corner crease so 40-50 in my opinion. $225
Bobby Wallace PSA 4 $1,200

MORE ADDITIONS 5-18 thru 5-25-2014
PSA 4's Dunn, Lobert, Schaefer  $250 each

PSA 5's Blankenship, Clymer, McLean, Niles, Pfeister, Sebring, Steienfeldt and Street. $400 each

PSA 6 Spencer $700

SGC 60's
Anderson, Beebe, Byrnes, Clymer, Conroy, Crandall, Hartzell, Kahoe, Lord, Lush $400 each

SGC 70's Clymer, Coakley, Ewing, Ruelbach $450 each

Scans upon request so as not to make the page too bulky.

Also have many others, PSA and SGC, please PM

PM sent for the Burkett.

Scott

I have always liked this set, but don't follow it or collect it.  So it wasn't until this post did I ever realize the Jack Powell card displayed Harry Howell .  I looked back and found an interesting thread about that (and incidentally another card you have for sale, and the only image I own from the set, also has the wrong image and that is Hartzell).

I am sure you knew all of this, but I just thought I would give you a free bump while pointing out how my knowledge grew today because of your post.
Is not Hartzell(Hartsel) the correct image but the wrong team? That was Roy Hartzell
Bump for reduced prices, have these and many more. PM with inquiries
Weekly additions and a couple prices lowered.
